parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its hit part index). All hit points can be obtained with [[getAllHitPointsDamage]] command.
* 0: no damage
* 1: full damage </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setHitIndex''' [hitPartIndex, damage, useEffects]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle : [[Object]] - vehicle to be damaged </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> hitPartIndex: [[Number]] - hit part index of the Hit Point</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> damage: [[Number]] - level of damage </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4 </name>=<value> useEffects: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[true]]) [[false]] to skip destruction effects. <template><title>since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setHitIndex]] [1, 1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setHitIndex]] [7, 0.5];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getAllHitPointsDamage]], [[getHitIndex]], [[getHitPointDamage]], [[setHitPointDamage]], [[setHit]], [[getHit]], [[setDamage]], [[damage]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
